study.title: SW USA 2000 Year Growing Degree Days and Precipitation Reconstructions
study.description: High spatial resolution (30 arc-second) Southwestern United States tree-ring reconstructions of May-September Growing-degree Days (GDD) and Net Water-year Precipitation (previous October - current November). The reconstructions were performed using the 'PaleoCAR' method detailed in Bocinsky and Kohler (2014).
study.citation: R. Kyle Bocinsky, Johnathan Rush, Keith W. Kintigh and Timothy A. Kohler. 2016. Exploration and exploitation in the macrohistory of the pre-Hispanic Pueblo Southwest. Science Advances, 2(4), e1501532. doi: 10.1126/sciadv.1501532
